Artemis::

Artemis opened her comm link and said to Pacifix"I'm ready to leave 
Autobot's base. Do you whant that I sent Sludge to cover you?"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> -- Anachronox / Pacifix --
> 
> Anachronox listens intently to Daemos' description of 
> his "birth". "I was an Autobot? I have no memory of being an 
autobot 
> and I don't want to be one. I am a Tripredacus member." he says 
> arrogantly. He mumbles out loud to himself, "Pacifix... make me an 
> autobot... bah, I could take him anyday." not really understanding 
> the who he was dealing with, even though he'd been told.
> 
> -----------------------
> 
> Pacifix replies, "Alright, I'll be arriving momentarily." He 
> continues driving towards the Tripred base, which was now visible 
to 
> him in the distance.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > OOC: it's okay!
> > 
> > Daemos: Just a moment.
> > 
> > He sends a welcome message to Pacifix, also signaling him that 
the 
> > shields will be lowered when he arrives.
> > 
> > Daemos: You see, Anachronox, your "birth" is a special event. You 
> were 
> > not a protoform, no. You were an autobot called Firedrill. I have 
> been 
> > warned about your pledge of alliegance to the Tripredacus. I am 
> not 
> > accusing you of anything, I am merely telling you the facts. 
> Somehow 
> > the Renewal Chamber you were in reformatted you. You must know, 
> > however, that if Pacifix, the autobot leader, and I find that 
> > Firedrill can be revived, such thing could happen.
> > 
> > Belthassan: That is, if you agree. I think you could make a fine 
> > addition to our forces.
